WHY_ME.TITLE: Why me
WHY_ME.ABOUT_ME2: As a junior developer, I bring fresh perspectives, initiative, and a strong work ethic to every project. I don’t just write code — I think ahead and focus on finding effective solutions
WHY_ME.TEXT2: I am open to work remote...|

MY_SKILLS.TITLE: My Skills
MY_SKILLS.PARAG2: I am passionate about implementing innovative approaches in my work, exploring unconventional solutions, and actively sharing knowledge with the team.

POKEDEX.TITLE: Pokedex
POKEDEX.TEXT1: Diese Anwendung ist ein digitaler Pokédex, der detaillierte Informationen zu verschiedenen Pokémon präsentiert, darunter Name, Typ, Fähigkeiten und Entwicklungsstufen. Die Daten werden mithilfe der PokéAPI in Echtzeit abgerufen und direkt in der App angezeigt, sodass stets aktuelle und umfassende Informationen bereitstehen.
POKEDEX.PARAG2: How I have organised my work process
POKEDEX.TEXT2: I divided my workflow into clearly structured steps: first, I planned the basic architecture and design; then I developed the logic in JavaScript and used HTML for the framework as well as CSS for the layout. This organization helped me stay on top of things and carry out each phase efficiently.

ELPOLLOLOCO.TITLE: El Pollo Loco
ELPOLLOLOCO.TEXT1: This game is a two-dimensional jump-and-run adventure. Playing as the character Pepe, you collect salsa bottles, hurl them at crazy chickens, and ultimately face a powerful final boss.
ELPOLLOLOCO.PARAG2: How I have organised my work process
ELPOLLOLOCO.TEXT2: In this project, I applied an object-oriented methodology and organized the code into well-structured modules. By using JavaScript classes and methods, I built reusable components and kept the logic clean and maintainable. HTML provided the structural backbone of the content, while CSS handled the visual design and layout. This clear division streamlined development, simplified updates, and ensured I could maintain a solid overview of the entire process.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.TEXT1: This Kanban board was developed as part of a team project. We used Angular together with TypeScript and SCSS for the frontend, while the backend was built on Firebase. In addition, we gained valuable experience with professional teamwork following the Scrum framework and worked with tools such as Git and Figma.
JOIN.PARAG2: How I have organised my work process
JOIN.TEXT2: To keep my code clean and easy to maintain, I followed best practices such as using descriptive names for files, variables, and classes. By breaking the project into modular, reusable components, I established a clear structure and ensured the application remains easily scalable.
JOIN.TEXT3: Together we built the login section and the task-creation feature. This group collaboration allowed me to put modern web technologies into practice while gaining valuable experience in coordinated team development.

DABUBBLE.TITLE: DaBubble
DABUBBLE.TEXT1: DaBubble is an innovative social media platform that enables users to connect in a safe and engaging environment. With features such as creating profiles, sharing posts, and interacting with other members, DaBubble fosters the exchange of ideas and the formation of communities.

TEAMPLAYER.TITLE: Need a teamplayer? Here what my colleagues said about me
TEAMPLAYER.OPINION_TEXT1: I worked with Magda on our Kanban board, and she made a strong impression right from the start. She combines technical expertise with a great sense for clean design and user-friendliness. On top of that, she’s always helpful, brings positive energy to the team, and makes sure that working together is both enjoyable and effective.
TEAMPLAYER.OPINION_TEXT2: Magda was instrumental in ensuring the high quality of our project. Her precise approach and deep understanding of clean code architecture were evident in the well-structured, reusable Angular components. With her keen eye for design and user experience, she optimized the user interface and improved the SCSS structure, seamlessly combining technical excellence with creative design.

CONTACT_ME.TITLE: Contact me
CONTACT_ME.TEXT: I’m particularly interested in working on innovative and user-centered web applications — where clean code, responsiveness, and great user experience matter. With a strong background in HTML, SCSS, Angular, and responsive design, I bring attention to detail, high coding standards, and a proactive mindset to every project I join. Let’s create something exceptional together — I’m ready to contribute to your team with technical expertise, clear communication, and a passion for building intuitive, scalable interfaces.
CONTACT_ME.NAME: Your Name
CONTACT_ME.NAME-ERROR2: Name must be at least 4 characters long.
CONTACT_ME.MESSAGE-ERROR2: Message must be at least 10 characters long.
CONTACT_ME.DATENSCHUTZ3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
CONTACT_ME.DATENSCHUTZ-ERROR: You must accept the privacy policy.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.TEXT2: The protection of your personal data is very important to me. Personal data is processed only to the extent necessary for providing a functional website and for handling your inquiries. The legal basis for the processing is Article 6(1)(f) of the GDPR (legitimate interest), unless a more specific legal basis (e.g., consent) applies.
PRIVACY_POLICY.TEXT3: When you visit this website, certain information transmitted by your browser is automatically collected. This includes your IP address, the date and time of your request, the type and version of your browser, your operating system, and the referring URL. This data is used solely for the technical monitoring and security of the website and is not combined with other data.
PRIVACY_POLICY.TEXT4: If you contact me via the contact form, the information you provide (name, email address, message) will be stored for the purpose of processing your Request.
PRIVACY_POLICY.TEXT4.1: Article 6(1)(a) GDPR (consent). You may withdraw your consent at any time with effect for the future.
PRIVACY_POLICY.TEXT5: This website may use so-called social plugins, such as those from Instagram, LinkedIn, or Facebook. When you visit a page that includes such a plugin, your browser may establish a direct connection to the servers of the respective provider. In doing so, personal data—such as your IP address—may be transmitted to these services, potentially including transfers to third countries like the United States. For more details, please refer to the privacy policies of the respective providers: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/privacy/policy/ Instagram: https://privacycenter.instagram.com/ LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.TEXT6: This website uses technically necessary cookies to enable certain functions (e.g., navigation, form protection).Cookiesare stored on the basis of Article 6(1)(f) of the GDPR (legitimate interest in providing a functional website).You can disable cookies at any time in your browser settings.
PRIVACY_POLICY.TEXT7: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights: The right to access the data stored about you (Art. 15 GDPR), therightto rectification of inaccurate data (Art. 16 GDPR), the right to erasure (Art. 17 GDPR), the right torestriction ofprocessing (Art. 18 GDPR), the right to object to processing (Art. 21 GDPR), the right to data portability (Art.20 GDPR), and the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority (e.g., the data protection authority of North Rhine-Westphalia).
PRIVACY_POLICY.TEXT8: I reserve the right to update this privacy policy to comply with legal requirements or to reflect changes to the website. Last updated: July 2025.
PRIVACY_POLICY.TEXT9: Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for the content of external links. The responsibility for the content of linked pages lies solely with their respective operators.
PRIVACY_POLICY.TEXT10: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution:
